title: Metadata Layout (MLB)
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user navigates to the beta Homepage Tray oage
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the page
custom_expected:
THEN
- On L and XL Screens, blurb and description should be to the right of the video player. 
- On M and S screens, blurb and description should be below the video player.

title: Autoplay
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user navigates to beta Homepage Tray video page
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the page
custom_expected: THEN The video should always autoplay muted on pageload, unless the user's device or browser has disabled autoplay.

title: Pre Roll Ad
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user navigates to beta Homepage Tray page
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the video
custom_expected:
THEN
- The tray should always request an ad before playing a video. 
- If the ad manaager provides an ad, it should play on pageload. (Note: sometimes the ad server does not provide an ad, and ad blockers will often block the add) 
- *On desktop AND mobile*, ads should have a countdown timer and a mute/unmute button. Clicking hte body of the video player itself should click through to a sponsored URL. 
- On mobile, ads should haave a button to ""Learn more,"" which will click through to a sponsored URL. Tapping the body of hte video on mobile should pause and play the video.

title: Editor sets up tray to play a single video
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is viewing video page with tray to play a single video
custom_steps: WHEN The user views page
custom_expected: THEN If the tray is provided only with a video slug in Forge, the video should autoplay on pageload. When the clip is complete, the video player should display poster image and play button. If the user clicks the play button, the same video should play again.

title: Editor sets up tray to play a topic
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on video page and is set up to play a topic
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the page
custom_expected: THEN If the tray is provided only with a topic slug in Forge, the tray should cylce through the topic list, displaying a leave behind between each clip.

title: Editor sets up tray to play a video and a topic
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on a page set up o play video and topic
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the page
custom_expected:
THEN If the tray is provided with a video slug AND a topic slug, the tray should first play the provided video, and then play through the topic list, showing a leave behind between each clip. 

(NOTE - RIGHT NOW THIS DOES NOT WORK)

title: Metadata Layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user navigates to the beta VSM standalone page
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the page
custom_expected: THEN The user can see (on all screen sizes) video player should display poster image, play button, blurb, duration, and contentDate

title: Autoplay
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user navigates to the beta VSM standalone page
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the page with autoplay on
custom_expected:
THEN a video should be clicked to play (not autoplay)

(Note from Turner: we are working on an enhancement where editors can set the player to either autoplay or click to play)

title: Playing video
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigates to the vsm standalone page
custom_steps: WHEN user plays the video
custom_expected:
THEN The video should play with volume on click
AND After playback, video should return to what it looked like before the user clicked to play it.

title: Editor always sets up video player to play a single video
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigates to the vsm standalone page
custom_steps: WHEN edittor sets up video player to play single video
custom_expected: THEN editor can see the only option for setting up a standalone video module in VSM is to provide a single video slug (ask turner for clairifcation??)

title: Metadata Layout
custom_preconds:
Given user navigates to MLB Video page

https://www.mlb.com/video/paul-dejong-on-20-season-outlook?t=most-popular
https://www.mlb.com/video/search?q=Team+%3D+%5B%22Arizona+Diamondbacks%22%5D+Order+By+Timestamp
custom_steps: WHEN user views the page
custom_expected: THEN on all screen sizes, video players should display poster image, play button, blurb, duration, and contentDate

title: List layout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user navigates to MLB video page

https://www.mlb.com/video/paul-dejong-on-20-season-outlook?t=most-popular
https://www.mlb.com/video/search?q=Team+%3D+%5B%22Arizona+Diamondbacks%22%5D+Order+By+Timestamp
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the list layout
custom_expected:
THEN
(Currently, the only option for setting up a video list in VSM is to provide a single topic slug.)
- The list will consist of the provided topic slug
- Editors can designate a limit of how many video players to display.  
- Editors can also designate a "skip" value in order to start at a given number in the topic list rather than at the default #1

title: Autoplay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user navigates to MLB video pages 

https://www.mlb.com/video/paul-dejong-on-20-season-outlook?t=most-popular
https://www.mlb.com/video/search?q=Team+%3D+%5B%22Arizona+Diamondbacks%22%5D+Order+By+Timestamp"
custom_steps: WHEN The user is viewing video
custom_expected: THEN videos should be click to play (not autoplay)

title: Playing video
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user navigates to MLB video pages

https://www.mlb.com/video/paul-dejong-on-20-season-outlook?t=most-popular
https://www.mlb.com/video/search?q=Team+%3D+%5B%22Arizona+Diamondbacks%22%5D+Order+By+Timestamp
custom_steps: WHEN The user is playing video
custom_expected:
THEN 
- The videos should play with volume on click
- After playback, each video should return to what it looked like before the user clicked to play it.
- If one video is playing and a user clicks play on another video, the initial video should stop playing and the new video should start playing.
